contributors.confirm_remove_affiliation_text: Are you sure you want to remove this affiliation?
contributors.confirm_remove_author_text: Are you sure you want to remove {{contributorName}}?
contributors.create_new_author_description:
Personregisteret inneholder personer med opphavsrett til publiserte vitenskapelige arbeid som er tilgjengelig i institusjonens bibliotek, vitenarkiv eller er del av Norsk Vitenskapsindeks. Også omtalte personer kan bli registrert.

Om personen du søker har publisert noe vitenskapelig tidligere, eller har nylig fullført en vitenskapelig grad ved en norsk utdanningsinstitusjon, så er det sannsynlig at personen alt er registrert.

En kurator vil prøve å finne ut om dette er en ny person eller om det er en ny skrivemåte på en tidligere registrert person.

description.npi_disciplines: Scientific field in Norwegian publication indicator
description.keywords_helper: Separate keywords with commas or enter

feedback.minimum_one_author: You need to have at least one author registered for this registration
feedback.minimum_one_editor: You need to have at least one editor registered for this registration
feedback.minimum_one_file: You need to have at least one file uploaded for this registration
feedback.minimum_one_supervisor: You need to have at least one supervisor registered for this registration

files_and_license.administrative_contract: Author agreement or other file to be saved but not published
files_and_license.no_duplicates: Cannot add "{{fileName}}", because a file with the same name already exists
files_and_license.title: File name

public_page.current_validation_errors: NB! The registration has validation errors that must be fixed before it can be published
public_page.preview_unavailable: Preview not available. Open file in suited program.
public_page.request_doi_description: When you request a DOI (Digital Object Identifier), the order will go through a curator at your institution for quality control. Add a message in case of any questions or clarifications. You will receive an email when the request has been evaluated.

registration.no_published_registrations_yet: There are no published registrations yet
registration.start_with_link_to_resource_description: Link to original version if the resource already has been published on the Internet with a DOI
registration.start_with_link_to_resource_title: Start with link to original version
registration.start_with_uploading_file_description: Upload file if the resource isn't published on the Internet with a DOI

chapter.info_anthology: The anthology where this chapter is published in must be published in advance
chapter.search_for_anthology: Search for the anthology where the chapter is published

resource_type.delete_doi_text: Removing the link to the publication will change it from a registration to a new publication. Do you want to continue?
resource_type.is_book_a_textbook_confirm: Yes, the book is a textbook
resource_type.is_not_peer_reviewed: The registration is not peer reviewed
resource_type.nvi_fail: This publication can not be included in the Norwegian Science Index.
resource_type.nvi_fail_no_peer_review: This publication can not be incuded in the Norwegian Science Index, since it's not peer reviewed.
resource_type.nvi_fail_not_rated:
This publication can not be included in the Norwegian Science Index (NSI), since selected publication channel is not at level 1 or 2. 

(The publication channel's level may be changed, so the publication can be included in NSI)
resource_type.nvi_success: This publication can be included in the Norwegian Science Index
resource_type.series_info: If the publication is part of a series

support_description: When you request support your message will be sent to a curator at your institution. You can see responses at <0>My Messages</0>.
modal_unsaved_changes_description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
